name: Fun School!
description:
Fun School! is an educational game part of the Fun School series. This version is aimed at the under twelve years. Parents can choose a difficulty level for each game and also enter their own words to use. There are ten activities for a child to play and these consist of:
  • Anagrams
  • Code Breakers
  • Dogduckcorn
  • Guessing
  • Hangman
  • Maths Hike
  • Nim
  • Odd Man Out
  • Pelmanism
  • Tower-Hanoi
alsoFor: Amstrad CPC, BBC Micro | Combined View
